24Table of Contents   Introduction   Environmental   Social   Governance  
Strong corporate governance is foundational at VSE. We recognize the importance 
of a robust and effective governance structure, both for our business and for 
the benefit of our shareholders, employees, customers, suppliers, and other 
stakeholders. We adopted policies and guidelines which, together with our bylaws, 
committee charters, and other key governance practices and policies, provide the 
framework for strong and effective corporate governance.VSE Governance
Our Approach
